Hey Milt,
    There are pictures of two different tangs.  Looks like someone that was 
at the show is busting your balls.  If they are from Chicago then they must be 
part of your local sword study group possibly.  I seem to remember that 
someone on this list knew that you had left your sword in the shinza room.  I think 
someone on this list must know what is going on, but would rather see you 
squirm for a bit.  Good luck on finding out who it is.

Lou
